w:r.w:t: TITLE: What Makes a Good Friend
The teacher will what it means to be a good friend by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases: kind, unkind, friends, helpful,
helpful is kind, sharing, Sharing is kind, giving high fives, giving high f
ives is kind, teasing, teasing is unkind, fighting, fighting is unkind, not listening, not listening is unkind
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for being a good friend
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use sets of words in complete sentences
This slide will always be the
-branded opener slide that the teacher will display as the student enters the classroom.
